publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2154 Richard Baker: Richards of Aberdeen Textiles—That the Parliament notes the excellent efforts by employees of JobcentrePlus in the north east who volunteered their time, including during a weekend, to give help and advice to those who had lost their jobs as a result of the Richards of Aberdeen textile factory closure; further notes that the volunteers came not only from the city of Aberdeen but from across the north east, and congratulates and thanks all those volunteers from JobcentrePlus who took part in this great effort for the work they have done in finding alternative work for a significant number of former Richards’ employees.
